title: My Little Dinosaur
description: A little boy meets a little dinosaur one day. He wants to keep him at home, but his father is afraid that he will become very large. Father calls in a professor he knows, who assures him that this kind of dinosaur doesn't grow and would the same size always. The dinsosaur becomes a pet and the boy and his friend are happy together.
author: Ilse-Margret Vogel
